meanings.definition: Capable of being easily upset or agitated.
meanings.sent1: She is so flappable that even a small noise startles her.
meanings.sent2: The paper-thin glass was flappable in the strong wind.
meanings.sent3: His flappable reaction to the surprise party was priceless.
meanings.sent4: Her flappable nature turned her into a nervous wreck.
meanings.sent5: The flappable kitten jumped at the sudden movement.

meanings.definition: Able to be moved or manipulated easily.
meanings.sent1: The flappable curtains swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The flappable toy car could be controlled with a remote.
meanings.sent3: The flappable clay was easy to shape into different figures.
meanings.sent4: His flappable loyalty made him an easy target for manipulation.
meanings.sent5: The flappable fabric draped smoothly over the furniture.

meanings.sent1: She is so flappable that any surprise makes her jump.
meanings.sent2: The flappable child giggled uncontrollably at the silly joke.
meanings.sent3: His flappable behavior at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her flappable enthusiasm lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The flappable puppy wagged its tail at the sight of a treat.
